name: Function naming convention
description: ABAP Functions should begin with Z. This reports shows all the ABAP Functions not starting with Z. The prefix is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all ABAP Functions that does not respect the naming conventions.
It provides the following information:
ABAP Function full name
rationale: For readability aspects and to respect SAP standard, naming conventions must be respected.
remediation: Change name according to the naming convention.
